raw_data.name: Lambert’s
raw_data.full_address: 3409 Brookshire Blvd, Charlotte, NC 28216, United States

reviews_data.review_text: This coffee blessed my soul. It was delicious and made with love.

I got a island smoothie and I didn’t catch the tenders name but she gave me a sample of their new colada smoothie it was soo good, I asked for some of the colada flavor in my smoothie and I’m obsessed. Located inside the church very nice.

The customer service here was great and the employees were very welcoming. I was instantly greeted when I came in  and they explained a few items on their menu to me. Their frappe were also very good.

I'm convinced Lambert's is either no longer in business or only opens when the church it's connected to is in service. I went once and it was pretty good. Attempted to go three times since, and all three times it was closed during times it was stated to be open.
a little expensive for what you get but the employee was great

Got the watermelon lemonade and the vanilla chai latte.
The drinks tasted amazing and the customer service was even better!

We stopped by this place for coffee & croissants and it was soooooo good. They are so welcoming and the vibe was beautiful. They have many different flavors of frappes and coffee and even have delicious lemonade.
Amazing red velvet frappe (2x), great service. I will be back next time I'm in Charlotte.

First time , They . Are . Delicious!!! My boyfriend and I got the Oreo & Red velvet Frappes. Must try!!! 10/10 I would go everyday if i could , also they do serve croissants and bagels - those were good too 💗 customer service was wonderful

Very nice. Atmosphere and service good. I enjoyed a caramel iced latte with almond milk. While sitting and chatting with a friend we were offered samples of their in house sweets (Apple fritter) and a flavored lemonade which was delicious.
Outstanding
First visit. Very friendly and helpful staff. Extremely nice atmosphere. Very clean. Will come back.
Great place to visit red velvet frap was amazing and they have great food check this place out asap

Lambert’s is a hidden gem! I got the bacon, egg and cheese croissant with a caramel machiatto this morning. It was delicious! I came back later to get the red velvet frappe which was so good! Great service, visually appealing. Everyone was very friendly!
Love the environment and the staff!  We tried a few various items on the menu, and we loved each one of the .
1 word. Amazing. ❤️‍🔥
Love this place! Had to add it to Google. They’re always welcoming and you have to try their breakfast sandwiches and lemonade!! Shoutouts to Tasha.
They have the best breakfast sandwiches!
